title: HoP 167 - When Bad Things Happen to Good People - Suffering in Jewish Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 167 - When Bad Things Happen to Good People - Suffering in Jewish Philosophy
description: The Book of Job provokes Saadia, Maimonides, Ibn Tibbon and Gersonides to reflect on why God allows suffering.
content:encoded: The Book of Job provokes Saadia, Maimonides, Ibn Tibbon and Gersonides to reflect on why God allows suffering.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson
